pr_title: DHFPROD-5186: Display multi-value property of simple values as a list in source table

timeline.bodyText: I think these are typically removed in the UI code too before merging to develop?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Oops, accidentally left that in; thanks for catching it! Removed.
replies.author: briantang
